languages.text: "Славьте Императора, верные! Тьма вокруг нас свирепа, но пламя в наших сердцах яростнее! Зло сгорит!"

traits.locale_text: "Славьте Императора, верные! Тьма вокруг нас свирепа, но пламя в наших сердцах яростнее! Зло сгорит!"

languages.text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"
languages.original_text: "Славьте Императора, верные! Тьма вокруг нас свирепа, но пламя в наших сердцах яростнее! Зло сгорит!"

traits.locale_text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful folk! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the flame in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"
"Praise the Emperor, faithful folk! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the flame in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"
"Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"
"Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"
"Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"

languages.text: 「皇帝を称えよ、忠実な魂たち！我らを包む闇は荒々しいかもしれぬ。だが我らの心で燃えさかる炎はさらに猛り立っている！邪悪は燃えるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝を称えよ、忠実な魂たち！我らを包む闇は荒々しいかもしれぬ。だが我らの心で燃えさかる炎はさらに猛り立っている！邪悪は燃えるのだ！」

languages.text: “赞美帝皇吧，忠诚的灵魂！既然黑暗想要吞噬我们，那就让我们心中的烈焰消灭黑暗吧！烈焰必将烧尽一切邪恶！”
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"

traits.locale_text: “赞美帝皇吧，忠诚的灵魂！既然黑暗想要吞噬我们，那就让我们心中的烈焰消灭黑暗吧！烈焰必将烧尽一切邪恶！”

languages.text: «¡Alabad al Emperador, almas fieles! La oscuridad que nos rodea es feroz, ¡pero más feroz es la llama de nuestros corazones! ¡El mal arderá!».
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alabad al Emperador, almas fieles! La oscuridad que nos rodea es feroz, ¡pero más feroz es la llama de nuestros corazones! ¡El mal arderá!».

languages.text: « Loué soit l'Empereur, fidèles ! Les ténèbres qui nous entourent sont peut-être épaisses, mais la flamme qui anime notre cœur ne se laissera pas étouffer ! Le mal brûlera ! »
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"

traits.locale_text: « Loué soit l'Empereur, fidèles ! Les ténèbres qui nous entourent sont peut-être épaisses, mais la flamme qui anime notre cœur ne se laissera pas étouffer ! Le mal brûlera ! »

languages.text: "Preiset den Imperator, gläubige Seelen! Die Dunkelheit um uns herum mag stark sein, aber das Feuer in unseren Herzen ist noch stärker! Das Böse wird brennen!"
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"

traits.locale_text: "Preiset den Imperator, gläubige Seelen! Die Dunkelheit um uns herum mag stark sein, aber das Feuer in unseren Herzen ist noch stärker! Das Böse wird brennen!"

languages.text: "İmparator'a şükürler olsun ey sadık ruhlar! Etrafımızdaki karanlık gayretli olabilir ama onunki, kalplerimizdeki gayret ateşinin yanında bir hiçtir! Kötülük kül olacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "Praise the Emperor, faithful souls! The darkness around us may be fierce, but the blaze in our hearts is fiercer still! Evil will burn!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'a şükürler olsun ey sadık ruhlar! Etrafımızdaki karanlık gayretli olabilir ama kalplerimizdeki gayret ateşinin yanında bir hiç! Kötülük kül olacak!"
